title: Gyakutaisarete Ita Shouka No Reijou Wa Seijo No Chikara Wo Te Ni Ire, Mujikaku Ni Youshanaku Gyakushuu Suru
alternative_title: 虐待されていた商家の令嬢は聖女の力を手に入れ、無自覚に容赦なく逆襲する ; An Abused Merchant’s Daughter Gains the Power of a Saint and Unknowingly and Mercilessly Strikes Back
status: 虐待されていた商家の令嬢は聖女の力を手に入れ、無自覚に容赦なく逆襲する ; An Abused Merchant’s Daughter Gains the Power of a Saint and Unknowingly and Mercilessly Strikes Back
description:
Description :
        The discarded girl is the strongest saint!? She shows no mercy to her enemies! A popular work from "Become a Novelist" is eagerly awaited to be turned into a manga!! Sonia, who has been oppressed by her aunt's family for many years, is discarded in the forest and prepares herself for death Although Sonia is prepared for death, she is found by the kind-hearted priest Falne!? An exhilarating tale of a discarded saint's revenge!!Read Gyakutaisarete Ita Shouka no Reijou wa Seijo no Chikara wo Te ni Ire, Mujikaku ni Youshanaku Gyakushuu suru on mangabuddy.me+
